articles.title: ‘Human shielding in action’: Israeli forces strap Palestinian man to jeep - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Israeli forces tie wounded Palestinian man to a military jeep in an incident a UN expert condemned as human shielding.
articles.content:
Israeli forces in the occupied West Bank have tied a wounded Palestinian man to the hood of a military vehicle during a raid on the city of Jenin, appearing to use him as a human shield.
